sewage, treated.name: sewage, treated
sewage, treated.description: Municipal sewage that has received secondary, so including activated sludge

surface water, general.name: surface water, general
surface water, general.description: Rivers, lakes, ponds. Select this categogy if no indication of the level of contamination is known

surface water, contaminated.name: surface water, contaminated
surface water, contaminated.description: Rivers, lakes, ponds that are prone to discharge of treated or untreated wastewater or other sources of fecal contamination are known (e.g. cattle accessing the water, runoff from agricultural land)

surface water, protected.name: surface water, protected
surface water, protected.description: Rivers, lakes, ponds where the absence of pollution is actively managed, e.g. in protcted catchments

rainwater, rooftop harvesting.name: rainwater, rooftop harvesting
rainwater, rooftop harvesting.description: Rainwater collected from rooftops or other surface areas which are kept relatively clean

rainwater, stormwater harvesting.name: rainwater, stormwater harvesting
rainwater, stormwater harvesting.description: Rainwater collected from roads or other surfaces which are likely to be contaminated

groundwater.name: groundwater
groundwater.description: Groundwater, especially shallow wells, may be contaminated from ingress from the surface (manure, latrines) or contamination through the well head

sewage, raw.name: sewage, raw
sewage, raw.description: Municipal sewage that has not received any treatment or only minimal treatment e.g. sedimentation
